snippet: Vast gaps in data on older people threaten to undercut new goals established by the United Nations for raising living standards over the next 15 years.
abstract: HelpAge International, nonprofit advocate for the aging, reports that poverty rates for elderly are missing for at least 93 countries; argues lack of data can undermine Sustainable Development Goals, list of established by United Nations of social, economical and ecological objectives in seeking rise in global living standards by 2030.
lead_paragraph: Vast gaps in data on older people threaten to undercut new goals established by the United Nations for raising living standards over the next 15 years.

headline.main: Older People Are Invisible in Key Data, Study Warns
headline.print_headline: Older People Are Invisible in Key Data, Study Says
